name: blog7
title: Blog7
description: A blog showcase block with a header, description, and 3-column grid of posts, featuring images, titles, summaries, and read-more links.

name: community1
title: Community1
description: A component featuring a logo, a call-to-action for joining a community, and social buttons.

name: contact7
title: Contact7
description: A contact block with title, description, and 3 columns for email, address, and phone, each with icons.

name: cta10
title: Cta10
description: A call-to-action component with a heading, description, and optional primary and secondary buttons arranged in a single column that becomes a row on larger screens.

name: cta11
title: Cta11
description: A component with heading, description, and up to two buttons, arranged vertically with emphasis styling.

name: faq1
title: Faq1
description: An accordion-style FAQ component with a customizable heading and list of questions and answers.

name: feature1
title: Feature1
description: A block with a 2-column layout featuring a title, description, two buttons, and an image on the right.

name: feature2
title: Feature2
description: A block with a 2-column layout featuring a title, description, two buttons, and an image on the left.

name: feature13
title: Feature13
description: A component showcases a heading and 2-column layout of features with title, subtitle, description, and image. Unique for using images as visual endpoints in each feature card.

name: feature17
title: Feature17
description: A component showcasing 6 core features with icons, using a 2-column grid layout, including a heading and subheading.

name: feature43
title: Feature43
description: A component showcasing 6 reasons with icons, titles, and descriptions in a 3-column grid for "Why Work With Us?".

name: list2
title: List2
description: A component displaying a list of awards with icons, titles, categories, and descriptions. Includes headings and buttons to view details.

name: navbar1
title: Navbar1
description: A navigational component with dynamic menus, offering desktop and mobile layouts, incorporating icons and accordion features for sub-menus.

name: pricing6
title: Pricing6
description: A pricing component with a heading, description, price, features list, and a call-to-action button. Features 3 groups of listed perks.

title: Services4
description: A component displaying services in a 2-column grid, detailing 4 services with icons, titles, descriptions, and bullet points. Features hover effects and a central header.

title: Stats8
description: A stats display component with a heading, description, and link, followed by a 4-column layout for statistics.

title: Team1
description: A team showcase component with a title, subtitle, description, and a grid of member avatars, names, and roles, supporting up to 4 columns.

title: Testimonial10
